resources.string: Looks like there is no pictures in this movement.
Looks like there is no pictures nor movements in this art period.
This gallery is empty. Maybe add some pictures first?
Looks like you have no Art Periods in your library.\nPlease add some before you come here to learn.
No items selected or chosen periodization items do not contain any pictures.\n\nPlease go back and fill them with pictures or choose new/other periodization items.

This module needs to read picture files from your device's memory to show them to you, so you can use them to test your knowledge.

Please grant the Read Storage permission if you want to use this module and take the test.

If you're concerned about security, feel free to check out the full code for this app on my GitHub page (link in app's "about" section)

To be able to download packages from the server, the app needs the Internet permission.\n\nIf you\'re concerned about security, feel free to check out the full code for this app on my GitHub page (link in app\'s \"about\" section)

After downloading package, the app needs to unpack the files to your storage. Therefore the Write Storage permission is needed.\n\nIf you\'re concerned about security, feel free to check out the full code for this app on my GitHub page (link in app\'s \"about\" section)

You are about to load an image file from your device's storage. The app needs the permission to access your files to be able to get the path and picture of chosen file.

Please grant the permission to continue.

If you're concerned about security, feel free to check out the full code for this app on my GitHub page (link in app's "about" section)

The app needs to load some pictures from the storage of your device. Otherwise you won't have anything to learn from.

Please grant the Read Storage permission to continue.

If you're concerned about security, feel free to check out the full code for this app on my GitHub page (link in app's "about" section)
Looks like you have no pictures added. Please add pictures, learn and then come back here to take a test :)

This app is created as a thesis project.

It is open source, which means you can take my code, read it and change it if you want.

This app does not contain and will never contain any ads. It also do not collect any of your data. As it comes to data, the app will have the backup copy option in the future, for convenience. And that's it.

For source code come to: https://github.com/paulina-niewiarowska/MentalaHaSZ 

Cheers, P.Niewiarowska
